# function: empty_trash

Empty volume trash asynchronously.



## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
empty_trash(id number) bool
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `id` (Number) Volume ID to empty trash
